name: The Last Metal Shooter
description:
the Last Metal Shooter is a 2d Game art style run and gun action game focused on wave battles with the enemies and fighting using different weapons that can be selected and changed during the fights.

"Game Missions"

the Main Game Mode is the "Game Missions" as the game has 5 main challenging missions with different kind of environment that it get harder by going forward in the game progress, the more you proceed further the more you meet different type of enemies and different challenges.
each level has an ending fight as a boss fight or a hard enemy waves to stand and defeat.

"Game Key Features"
besides running, jumping and shooting skills that need to use during the game, still need to utilize the token that being collected to enhance the weapons or the health such as weapons upgrades that need to find the upgrades token and upgrade the weapons to get stronger guns, and also there is money tokens that need to be collected and can be used to purchase health, Life.

"How to Win"
the main thing in the game is to survive and stand in the battles against the enemies by dodging the attacks, and the game main goal is to proceed to the level ending and fight the last battle till you reach to the final boss and defeat him then you can say you completed the game missions.
